content.prompt:
Directions: For each question in this part, you will hear a brief exchange between two people. From the four choices printed, choose the most appropriate remark that the first speaker could make in response to the remark of the second speaker.

NOW GET READY FOR THE NEXT BRIEF EXCHANGE

choices.label: Dann frage ich am besten jemand anders.
Kommen Sie; dann gehen wir zusammen dahin.
Jetzt finde ich es bestimmt. Vielen Dank.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
